name: Spiced Citrus Perfume
description: Experience the zesty freshness of citrus with a warm spice twist.

name: Vanilla Orchid Body Butter
description: Indulge your skin with the rich scent of vanilla blended with delicate orchid blossoms.

name: Mint Mojito Lip Balm
description: Keep your lips hydrated with the refreshing taste of mint and a hint of tropical sweetness.

name: Rosemary Lemon Infused Oil
description: Add a burst of flavor to your dishes with this invigorating blend of rosemary and lemon.

name: Ginger Lily Shower Gel
description: Awaken your senses with the spicy warmth of ginger paired with the delicate scent of lilies.

name: Pineapple Coconut Body Scrub
description: Treat your skin to a tropical getaway with the refreshing blend of pineapple and coconut, while gently exfoliating.

name: Jasmine Green Tea Perfume
description: A harmonious blend of jasmine flowers and green tea leaves, evoking a sense of tranquility and freshness.

name: Sandalwood Vanilla Room Spray
description: Create a cozy atmosphere with the comforting blend of sandalwood and vanilla, perfect for your home.

name: Berry Patch Perfume
description: Embark on a journey through a sun-kissed berry patch with this delightful fruity-floral fragrance.

name: Cocoa Spice Body Lotion
description: Nourish your skin with the comforting scent of cocoa and a hint of spicy warmth.

name: Ocean Breeze Body Mist
description: Refresh your senses with the crisp scent of ocean breeze, evoking the feeling of a seaside escape.

name: Lavender Eucalyptus Bath Salts
description: Unwind and relax with the soothing blend of lavender and eucalyptus, perfect for a calming bath experience.

name: Coconut Lime Verbena Hand Cream
description: Hydrate and nourish your hands with the tropical fusion of coconut, zesty lime, and fresh verbena.

name: Cherry Blossom Body Wash
description: Celebrate the arrival of spring with the delicate fragrance of cherry blossoms in a luxurious body wash.

name: Amber Patchouli Perfume Oil
description: Embrace your sensual side with the earthy blend of amber and patchouli in a luxurious perfume oil.

name: Honey Almond Body Scrub
description: Exfoliate and moisturize your skin with the sweet and nutty blend of honey and almond in this luxurious body scrub.

name: Lemon Verbena Hand Soap
description: Keep your hands clean and refreshed with the uplifting scent of lemon verbena in this luxurious hand soap.

name: Peppermint Eucalyptus Shampoo
description: Invigorate your hair and scalp with the refreshing blend of peppermint and eucalyptus in this revitalizing shampoo.

name: Chamomile Lavender Pillow Mist
description: Drift off into a peaceful sleep with the calming aroma of chamomile and lavender in this soothing pillow mist.
